page.title: 19How is Whitminster Changing.
page.content:
Over the past ten years many of the Gloucestershire villages have changed their character drastically. Employment on the land is not the only choice available to local people as it once was. With easy access to Bristol and Gloucester many residents no longer work directly in the area in which they live. Whitminster in common with these is in danger of becoming a dormitory village occupied by those who can afford to buy Cotswold cottages rather than local people who have been raised in the traditions of the area.
Much of the modern development in the area is out of keeping with the surrounds and needs to be carefully monitored if the village is not to lose its character completely.
